main event: Two cigar-shaped silver objects were observed flying low over Big Rock Candy Mountain, Utah for about ten seconds.
interesting points: The objects were the size of a silver dollar at arm's length and appeared one behind the other., The sighting lasted for ten seconds., The direction of flight was southwest., It was noted that the objects disappeared behind mountains., The report suggested that this sighting was probably caused by aircraft.
location: Big Rock Candy Mt., Utah, USA
